title: Northumberland Park station opening date confirmed
description: The overdue station on the Northumberland Line will open on 22 February, it is confirmed.
content:
The opening date for a delayed station on a reopened railway line has finally been revealed.
The Northumberland Line between Ashington and Newcastle began carrying passengers in December 2024, decades after the old service ended, however Bedlington a... [728 chars]

title: Rayner to back calls for Burnham to be allowed to stand in by-election
description: The Greater Manchester mayor has until Saturday afternoon to decide if he wants to enter the contest to be Labour's candidate.
content:
Former deputy prime minister Angela Rayner does not want Andy Burnham to be blocked from standing in the Gorton and Denton by-election, the BBC understands.
As first reported in The Times,, external Rayner is expected to publicly make her announcemen... [3550 chars]

title: UFC 324: Cameron Smotherman collapses at weigh-in for bantamweight fight
description: American bantamweight Cameron Smotherman collapses on the floor at the official weigh-in for Saturday's UFC 324 in Las Vegas.
content:
American bantamweight Cameron Smotherman collapsed on the floor at the official weigh-in for Saturday's UFC 324 in Las Vegas.
Smotherman looked unsteady on his feet as he stepped on to the scales inside the T-Mobile Arena on Friday morning.
After his... [657 chars]

title: People smuggler jailed for 10 years over Belgian lorry attempt
description: Ibrahim Sollaku admitted his role in the attempt to smuggle five Albanians into the UK in a lorry.
content:
A man has been jailed after admitting trying to help smuggle five Albanians into the UK in a lorry.
Ibrahim Sollaku, 33, of Wilton Avenue, Southampton, was arrested in Bournemouth on 5 November. At the same time, officers in Belgium arrested another ... [310 chars]

title: ‘We need to fight’: Trump Greenland threat brings sense of unity in Denmark
description: The US president has galvanised the Danish population against him, while Danes’ relations with Greenlanders are ‘under reparation’
content:
For the past three weeks, 24 hours a day, Denmark has been consumed by discussions about whether or not Greenland, a largely self-governing part of the Danish kingdom, will be invaded by the US, the Danes’ closest ally.
“We got a wake-up call,” said ... [8190 chars]
